amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress that decisions regarding medical care and treatment should be made by the physician or health care professional in consultation with the patient.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 106-709 to express the sense of Congress that medical decisions regarding treatment should be made by the physician or health care professional and the patient.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis (IL) amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
